criteria.name: Profit Margin >15%
criteria.description: Estimated profit margin meets minimum threshold

criteria.name: Resources Available
criteria.description: Technicians and equipment available without new hires

criteria.name: Risk Score <5.0
criteria.description: Overall risk assessment below medium threshold

criteria.name: Strategic Fit
criteria.description: Contract aligns with company strategic goals

criteria.name: Customer Relationship
criteria.description: Quality of existing or potential relationship

criteria.name: Contract Terms Acceptable
criteria.description: Payment terms, bonds, and conditions are acceptable

strongGo.label: STRONG GO
strongGo.recommendation: Pursue aggressively. Allocate top resources to proposal development.
actions: Consider site visit even if optional

go.label: GO
go.recommendation: Pursue with standard process. Good opportunity worth pursuing.

conditional.label: CONDITIONAL GO
conditional.recommendation: Proceed only with mitigation plan addressing identified concerns.
actions: Evaluate cost vs. benefit of mitigations
Obtain executive approval for conditional pursuit
Set decision deadline for final go/no-go

noGo.label: NO-GO
noGo.recommendation: Decline to bid unless strategically critical. Requires board approval to proceed.
actions: If pursuing anyway, escalate to board
Evaluate if declining damages future opportunities

scoringNotes.profitMargin: Calculate using fully-burdened costs including overhead, G&A, and risk contingency
scoringNotes.resources: Consider both immediate availability and ability to backfill from other projects
scoringNotes.riskScore: Use output from risk assessment engine - this is inverted (lower is better)
scoringNotes.strategicFit: Requires executive input on strategic priorities and long-term goals
scoringNotes.relationship: Historical payment record and communication quality are key factors
scoringNotes.contractTerms: Aggregate score from financial risk sub-criteria in risk assessment
